overview: From 2025-03-24 to 2025-03-25, elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

The day was marked by extensive code modifications across 297 files, focusing primarily on other work (45%) and tests (36%).
